statements: SELECT * FROM linguistic_corpus
SELECT corpus_name, language FROM linguistic_corpus WHERE language = 'English'
SELECT corpus_id, corpus_name FROM linguistic_corpus ORDER BY corpus_id DESC
SELECT * FROM linguistic_corpus WHERE language IN ('English', 'Spanish')
SELECT corpus_name FROM linguistic_corpus WHERE date_created >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM linguistic_corpus WHERE language = 'English' ORDER BY date_created DESC;
SELECT corpus_id, corpus_name, language FROM linguistic_corpus WHERE corpus_id > 100 ORDER BY corpus_name ASC;
SELECT corpus_id, corpus_name, date_created FROM linguistic_corpus WHERE language = 'French' AND date_created BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT corpus_id, language FROM linguistic_corpus WHERE corpus_name LIKE '%text%' ORDER BY corpus_id ASC, language DESC;
SELECT MAX(date_created) AS latest_date, MIN(date_created) AS earliest_date FROM linguistic_corpus WHERE language = 'German';
SELECT * FROM Corpus;
SELECT corpus_name, language FROM Corpus WHERE language = 'English';
SELECT document_id, document_name FROM Document ORDER BY document_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Document WHERE corpus_id = 1;
SELECT corpus_name, count(document_id) AS total_documents FROM Corpus JOIN Document ON Corpus.corpus_id = Document.corpus_id GROUP BY corpus_name;
SELECT * FROM Corpus WHERE corpus_id = 10;
SELECT document_id, document_name FROM Document WHERE corpus_id = 20 ORDER BY document_name DESC;
SELECT corpus_name, language FROM Corpus WHERE language = 'English';
SELECT * FROM Document JOIN Corpus ON Document.corpus_id = Corpus.corpus_id;
SELECT * FROM Corpus WHERE language = 'French' AND corpus_name LIKE '%text%';
SELECT * FROM Corpus;
SELECT corpus_name, language FROM Corpus ORDER BY language DESC;
SELECT document_id, document_name FROM Document WHERE corpus_id = 1;
SELECT sentence_text FROM Sentence WHERE document_id = 5;
SELECT COUNT(*) as total_documents FROM Document;
SELECT * FROM Document WHERE corpus_id = 1;
SELECT document_name, corpus_name FROM Document JOIN Corpus ON Document.corpus_id = Corpus.corpus_id;
SELECT sentence_text, document_name, corpus_name FROM Sentence JOIN Document ON Sentence.document_id = Document.document_id JOIN Corpus ON Document.corpus_id = Corpus.corpus_id;
SELECT DISTINCT language FROM Corpus WHERE corpus_name LIKE '%research%';
SELECT corpus_id, COUNT(document_id) AS num_documents FROM Document GROUP BY corpus_id ORDER BY num_documents DESC;
SELECT * FROM linguistic_corpus;
SELECT id, text FROM linguistic_corpus WHERE language = 'English';
SELECT title FROM publications ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT id, name, affiliation FROM authors WHERE name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT analysis_type, result FROM analysis_results WHERE analysis_type = 'sentiment';
SELECT id, text FROM linguistic_corpus WHERE language = 'English' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM authors WHERE affiliation LIKE '%University%';
SELECT title, publication_date FROM publications WHERE publication_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY publication_date ASC;
SELECT id, analysis_type, result FROM analysis_results WHERE analysis_type = 'Sentiment Analysis' LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, name, affiliation FROM authors WHERE name ILIKE '%Smith%' ORDER BY name;
SELECT * FROM corpora;
SELECT title, language FROM corpora ORDER BY date_created DESC;
SELECT author, content FROM texts WHERE author = 'John Doe';
SELECT sentence_number, sentence_content FROM sentences WHERE sentence_number > 5;
SELECT word_text, part_of_speech FROM words WHERE part_of_speech = 'noun';
SELECT * FROM corpora;
SELECT title, language FROM corpora ORDER BY date_created DESC;
SELECT t.author, s.sentence_content FROM texts t JOIN sentences s ON t.text_id = s.text_id;
SELECT DISTINCT c.category_name, w.word_text FROM categories c JOIN words w ON c.word_id = w.word_id WHERE w.part_of_speech = 'noun';
SELECT c.category_name, COUNT(w.word_id) AS word_count FROM categories c JOIN words w ON c.word_id = w.word_id GROUP BY c.category_name HAVING COUNT(w.word_id) > 5;
